topic.title: How to make a zite using create-react-app with a simple deploy script
topic.body:
So basically, the gist is that we make a regular nothing special create-react-app app then by treating our ZeroNet zite data folder as our deployed target and some configuration, we build our app into it then publish our built app to visitors on ZeroNet.

For detailed instructions, visit this post of mine on my zite

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Jw72CWtFuYiGkCnWxXMdAkwtFLMa21XmG/?/posts/zeronet-with-create-react-app-and-basic-routing-using-zeroframe-router_p1

Or my clearnet website

https://hackermobs.com/posts/reactjs-on-zeronet-p1-deploy-a-create-react-app-on-zeronet

You may also want to checkout some improvements I make on the deploy script

https://hackermobs.com/posts/react-on-zeronet-simple-deploy-script-improvement-1

but it only available on my clearnet website for now.
